name: U8Poker
description:
With 30 years of experience in the Casinos industry, John Huynh, (creator and founder of the Ultimate 8 Poker) presents to you a new poker game. Ultimate 8 is an exciting and entertaining game... The power and strategy is in yours hands!

Winner takes all! Win up to 5 x 1 odds on every Game! Game on near you!

John initially dealt an all-card Poker game, and realized that by changing it to an 8-card game, it would flow more efficiently and would be more entertaining. When he began to create Ultimate 8, he realized the potential in advancing this game to the next level. The world is ready for a new style of Poker! Come enjoy the new 8 card poker game U8 Poker!
